messageBody:
[Read_Alphabet] Re: Licensing for Jerome and Ghoti fon

~Fl jM R iG H mMB t krIEt foGts, plIL dOn[ fPget us /mAk fanatiks!  /wiGBOL /trMtFp foGts must bI koGvx[eB fP Ms oG a /mAk, if jM mEk it, n its fuG, /Fl ML it!




--- In Read_Alphabet@y..., "Jon Zuck" <jon@f...> wrote:
> I'd like to see the Read community develop fonts with all the crazy
> variety and expressiveness of the Shavian community.  Have at it!

I was thinking of making a few fonts myself, notably a Read version of ShawCurly. I'm also drawing some block font ideas (if you have the Impact font, like that, but thicker).

Part of me is worried that doing it will be no more than stroking my own ego, so to speak. Not that it will dissuade me, but I'm not sure how many people would actually download and use the font.

But, hey, there's only one way to find out. Besides, I'm out of practice creating fonts!

Thanks for the info, Jon!
